text: Anatomy of Restlessness was published in 1997 and is a collection of unpublished essays, articles, short stories, and travel tales. This collection spans the twenty years of Bruce Chatwin's career as a writer. This book was brought together by Jan Borm and Matthew Graves following the death of Chatwin in 1989. == External links == **Richard Utz, Review of Anatomy of Restlessness (Prolepsis) == References == Category:British travel books Category:1997 short story collections Category:Short story collections by Bruce Chatwin Category:Books published posthumously Category:Jonathan Cape books Category:English non-fiction books
title: Anatomy of Restlessness
